about: Statify allows you to quickly and easily check your stats for a variety of games.
fortniteHelp:
Syntax for Fortnite stats: `.s fortnite <Epic name>, <platform>, <game mode>`
Platform types: `psn, xbl, pc` (psn = PS4; xbl = Xbox One; pc = PC)
Game mode types: `solo, duo, squad, lifetime`
lolHelp: Syntax for Leauge of Legends stats: `.s lol <summoner name> <region>`. Available regions are BR1, EUN1, EUW1, JP1, KR, LA1, LA2, NA1, OC1, RU, TR1
warzoneHelp:
Syntax for CoD: Warzone stats: `.s warzone <gamertag> <platform>`.
Platform types: `xbl, battle` (xbl = Xbox; battle = Battle.net / Blizzard)
hypixelHelp:
Syntax for Hypixel stats: `.s hypixel <Minecraft username> <game mode>`.
Game mode types: `skywars`
csgoHelp: Syntax for CS:GO stats: `.s csgo <Steam username>` (the one you login with).
apexHelp:
Syntax for Apex Legends stats: `.s apex <gamertag> <platform>`
Platform types: `psn, xbl, origin` (psn = PS4; xbl = Xbox One; origin = PC)
